name.ch: 獨立研究：運動與認知科學

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: To provide an overview of the current state of research relating to the interactions between cognition and sporting performance and in particular extending beyond the more obvious motor-skill performance links
goal.ch: To provide an overview of the current state of research relating to the interactions between cognition and sporting performance and in particular extending beyond the more obvious motor-skill performance links

content.en:
"The course will primarily involve critical assessment of the expanding field of research in this area and cover:
- The effects of sport participation on cognitive performance
- The effects of sport skill on cognition and how this might be additive to the effects of fitness
- The relationship between cognitive training and how this might benefit sporting performance
- The strengths and weaknesses/limitations of the effects of sport on cognition
- Possible mechanisms of effects that are seen
- Possible utility of sports training in medical settings or in aging populations with the aim of providing cognitive benefits"
